comment:
OH my Gosh!!  -  Sir - you are AWESOME!!  I am pretty new to Body Language Science - (I am specifically referring to these incredible 
IN-DEPTH Analysis Videos)  The FACT that you are able to pull out so much DEPTH, TRUTH and INFORMATION from people, who are obviously trying to HIDE it; and Obfuscate and Confuse every answer with what THEY perceive as a BRILLIANT Performance on their part... but they CANNOT... because as Scripture says:
Psalms 51:6  -  YLT  (Youngs Literal Translation
6  Lo, TRUTH, THOU hast desired in the Inward parts, And in the HIDDEN part... "Wisdom" THOU "CAUSEST" me to "KNOW"
Psalms 51:6  -  KJV
6  Behold, THOU desirest TRUTH in the Inward parts; and in the HIDDEN part.... THOU shalt "MAKE" me to "KNOW WISDOM"
(ps.  I have added the quotation marks - for emphasis) - that it is the CREATOR HIMSELF that CAUSES the SEEKER to KNOW this WISDOM!!
THIS PROOVES in my opinion - that the CREATOR OF THE UNIVERSE - who CREATED US - BUILT INTO HIS CREATION A MECHANISM... 
THAT FORCES US TO BE TRUTHFUL - WHETHER "WE" DECIDE WE "WANT" TO OR "NOT"!!!  - I think that is totally AWESOME!  -
So - what I am saying is: that my Joy is to have found out... so late in life... (I am 75 years old) That it is completely possible; to have Analyzed - whether what a Suspect is saying is TRUTH - or NOT... by wonderful, decent people... for Righteousness and Justice! 
MAY YAHUAH'S MIGHTY NAME BE PRAISED!!!
(all we have to do now - is get rid of the Corruption of the Judges, etc - and all will be glorious)
oh well....
sincerely... anna peterman
